title: EXTERNAL TRADE LETTERS OF CREDIT (CONTROL) ACT
title_en: EXTERNAL TRADE LETTERS OF CREDIT (CONTROL) ACT

provisions.content: section 2 (2) [14th September, 1961] [Commencement. ] 1. Short title This Notice may be cited as the External Trade Letters of Credit (Control) (Exemption) Notice. 2.Exemption Philip Hill (Nigeria) Limited is hereby exempted from the requirements, under the Act, of confirmation by a licensed bank of letters of credit issued by it.
